Description: Learn how to say Thank you;Excuse me and other basic phrases in Japanese.
The Alphabets - Hiragana
Word order in Japanese.
Learn how to say "I want to eat sushi" in Japanese.

lesson_name: Is it time for green tea?
Description: Lean how to use the verb "飲む" to drink.

lesson_name: Would you like to see cherry blossoms?
Description: Lean how to use the verb "見る" to see.

lesson_name: Would you like to go to the park?
Description: Lean how to use the verb "行く" to go.

lesson_name: Would you like to see the movie?
Description: Lean how to use the verb "見る" to see.
Review the lessons and practice the phrases.
